subject: The European Central Bank
body:
The European Central Bank 
Kaiserstrasse 29 Eurotower 
Frankfurt am Main, 60311 Germany
This is to inform you that your fund of Seventy Million United States Dollars in your name has been abandoned with our Eurosystem check clearance for months by the depositor (SWIFT) because of the official clearance process of the check. As the prime component of the Eurosystem of the European System of Central Banks, we want to confirm your actual position on the fund before the confiscation since the clearance has been pending for months. This is the Governing Council's monetary policy decision today because of the profound implications of abandoning such a fund. Confirmation of your position on this fund is very important to help us contribute to the safety and soundness of the European banking system.
This is the most important instruction to ensure that your money is wired directly to your designated bank account or stays safe in the European System of Central Banks. You will apply for a European Union Fund Clearance Deduction Certificate. We call it general law or principleâ€”the official authority to deduct or subtract from your fund to clear your fund. Upon your reply to this message, I will forward the application document to process the official deduction permit. When funds are withheld from clearance, we will officially deduct them from the capital fund to clear them to avoid any delay. This is called authorization to deduct.
I, therefore, have every confidence that you will get back to us to avoid confiscation of this fund. We are waiting for your urgent confirmation of this important message before we will give you the full details and open full communications
Mrs. Christine Lagarde
President: European Central Bank 
Headquarters: Frankfurt, Germany

subject: Re:   The European Central Bank
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Could you please provide more details about the process of clearing the fund and how I can ensure that it is safely transferred to my designated bank account?

Best wishes,
Sheila

subject: Dear Sheila
body:
Dear Sheila

Thanking you for the mail with your response and will like you to 
understand the new board directives made it necessary that all 
beneficiary of such transfer will register and upgrade there contact 
information and identification papers therefore you should let us have 
the bellow information's so that we will register and authorized your 
name as well enable you have your deduction bill certificate procured 
and be thumbprint by you to give you irrevocable fund release signal.

,
Full legal name
Residential address
Telephone
Status of work

copy of ID

This will enable us apply for your deduction bill document to be 
thumbprinted as well to ascertain the releasing time frame of the fund
by ensuring the security of the service and safty of the reciever 
beneficairy.

I wait for your response
Thanks

Mrs. Christine Lagarde
SG/President: European Central Bank
Headquarters: Frankfurt, Germany

subject: Re: Dear Sheila
body:
Hello Sheila,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I appreciate your diligence in ensuring that all necessary steps are taken for the transfer process. Could you please provide more details on how the registration and upgrade of contact and papers will facilitate the fund release? 

I would like to understand better how this process works to ensure a smooth transaction. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Sheila

subject: Re: Dear Sheila
body:
Dear Shaila

Thanking you for the mail yes i have noted all your explanation towards 
the objective and the executive board here have authorized the release 
of these fund to you but only when you comply with the mandated 
requirement for all approve fund from this huge deposit with us rigth 
now in making sure that the fund goes through bitcoin to you because of 
security reasons

Therefore you should go ahead and reconfirm the requested information 
from you to
enable procure sign/endorsed a fund ownership certificate for you and 
you should not
listen to anybody asking you send advance fees for anything now rather 
till you have
control of these fund into your bitcoin account

Furthermore i am very sure you will show appreciation after you receive 
this fund
in your account with this my advise and directives so kindly send me the 
requested
information with a photo copy of your IDs to enable the board certified 
this application

As soon as this free obtainable fund ownership is procure for you and 
endorsed this
will enable you have fund crediting time frame also i will be in hand to 
guide and advice
you on how and what to do for immediate success of the above.

i will be waiting for the information's

Sincerely Yours

Mrs. Christine Lagarde
President: European Central Bank
Headquarters: Frankfurt, Germany

subject: Re: Dear Sheila
body:
Hello Shaila,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It sounds like a great opportunity to access the funds through bitcoin for security reasons. Could you provide more details on how the process works and what steps I need to take to comply with the requirements? I want to make sure everything is done correctly.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Sheila

subject: Your Fund Under Your Control Now
body:
Dear  Sheila

Thanking you for the mail yes i have noted your demand and request 
rather
there is no time now reference to time schedule of this service so as 
they
have signal the procurement Dept. please do kindly contact the
fund releasing and crediting unit Financial  Consultant UK for immediate 
crediting to you

Contact Person = Prof Raymond Nkado
Position      = Financial  Consultant UK
Direct Tel    = 447404469680
WhatsApp    = 447404469680
Email         = info@financials-consultant.com

Please they will direct you on how to open the bitcoin account freely 
and how
to test run the account to confirm as well to withdrawal from your 
account immediately

Please you should keep me inform no matter what is the situation do keep 
me updated
because my aim and objective is absolutely success which i know you will 
show appreciation to
me thereafter you have the fund under your control

Thanks and God bless

Sincerely Yours

Mrs. Christine Lagarde
President: European Central Bank
Headquarters: Frankfurt, Germany

body:

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,

subject: Attn Sheila
body:
The European Central Bank
Kaiserstrasse 29 Eurotower
Frankfurt am Main, 60311 Germany

Attn Sheila

Thanking you for the mail yes i have noted all that you said but please 
do contact Prof Raymond Nkado he will be in position to explain how the 
bitcoin works and what you are to do to receive your fund without 
anymore delay

Therefore you should kindly contact the fund releasing and crediting 
unit Financial Consultant UK for immediate crediting to you
he will explain everything in details to you and you will keep me inform 
and updated with the progress and success

Contact Person = Prof Raymond Nkado
Position      = Financial  Consultant UK
Direct Tel    = 447404469680
WhatsApp    = 447404469680
Email         = info@financials-consultant.com

Please he will direct you on how to open the bitcoin account freely and 
how to test run the account to confirm as well to withdrawal from the 
account as soon as he inform you that they have credited you and that 
you should go withdrawal from your account or re-transfer to your 
another account

Please you should keep me inform with the progress and success

Thanks and God bless

Sincerely Yours

Mrs. Christine Lagarde
President: European Central Bank

subject: Re: Attn Sheila
body:
Hello Sheila, thank you for reaching out. I appreciate your message and understand that you have not been involved in any fund transfer or credit activities. It's good to hear that Prof Raymond Nkado will provide more information and guidance on the process. Could you share more details about how you got in touch with Mrs. Christine Lagarde and Prof Raymond Nkado? I'm curious to learn more about this situation.

Sheila
